<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enhanced Hearing Aid](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1349)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 68</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These hearing aids work like [_magical hearing aids_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1347), but they're designed with a more potent and focused magic.

<document level="2" id="action-1050" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
